Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two students with a string between them, implying a connection but lacking detail.
The student might attempt a basic depiction of people speaking, but without clear indication of the technology or process involved.
CANNOT: The student does not draw any visual elements to indicate sound or communication over distance (student thinks the connection is visual rather than auditory).
The student does not include labels or captions explaining the purpose of the string or how communication happens (student doesn't understand the function of the device).
The student may not accurately depict the string as communicating sound; they might draw it as just a line or rope without functional context.
The drawing lacks any portrayal of how technology like this affects communication or everyday life (student doesn't understand technological impact).
